channel.title: A lil question while Creating Jad Minigame

item.title: A lil question while Creating Jad Minigame
item.dc:creator: @kristo_21 kristo 21
item.description:
@kristo_21 wrote:

Hello , well i decided to add a simple , custom jad minigame , it’s like that: You need to kill monsters from the lv 22 till jad , each monster once , they each drop different scroll , if you click on the scroll another monster comes up (stronger) , i’ve got it all just have no idea what the code is for adding npc. I gie you an example.

else if ((buryItem-1) == 550) { NPC ADD HERE }
What is the code for that?

Read full topic
item.source: A lil question while Creating Jad Minigame
